Help.Title: PokeBot Help
Help.Body:
/help — show this help message
/settings language <en|es> — set the bot language for this server
/settings stamina <1-5> — set how many stamina points are recovered per hour
/start — start your Pokémon adventure and choose a starter
/profile — show your trainer profile for this server
/move — move to a connected location, consuming stamina
Language.Set.Success.en: Language set to English for this server.
Language.Set.Success.es: Language set to Spanish for this server.
Language.Set.ForGuildOnly: This command can only be used inside a server.
Adventure.ForGuildOnly: This command can only be used inside a server.
Adventure.AlreadyStarted: You have already started your adventure on this server.
Adventure.InvalidStarter: Invalid starter. Options: Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle.
Adventure.SpeciesNotFound: Starter species was not found in the database.
Adventure.Start.Title: Your Pokémon adventure begins!
Adventure.Start.IntroBody: Welcome to the world of Pokémon! Choose your starter below. You have 1 minute to confirm.
Adventure.Start.ExpiredBody: Time is up. Run /start again if you still want to begin your adventure.
Adventure.Start.InitialLocationNotFound: Initial location was not found in the database. Please contact a server admin.
Adventure.Start.Announcement: {0} has arrived at **{1}** to join the adventure and has chosen **{2}** as their Pokémon partner!
Adventure.MustStartFirst: You need to start your adventure before using this command. Try /start.
Move.Title: Choose your destination
Move.Description: You are currently at {0}. You have {1} stamina. Choose where to go:
Move.NoStamina: You don't have enough stamina to move.
Move.NoAvailableDestinations: You cannot move anywhere from your current location.
Move.InvalidDestination: You cannot move to that location from here.
Move.RequiresBadge: You don't have the required badge to go there.
Move.ExpiredBody: Time is up. Run /move again if you still want to travel.
Move.MovedTitle: You moved to a new location!
Stamina.Set.Success: Stamina recovery has been set to {0} points per hour for this server.
Stamina.Set.Invalid: Invalid stamina per hour. Please choose a value between 1 and 5.
Profile.Title: Trainer Profile
Locations.PalletTown.Name: Pallet Town
